Type definition wstring

wstring

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/container/string.hpp>


typedef basic_string< wchar_t,std::char_traits< wchar_t >,std::allocator< wchar_t > > wstring;

Description

Typedef for a basic_string of narrow characters
